snippet: What happened at Kalach was a major disservice to the American efforts in Afghanistan.
abstract: Editorial contends 2012 beating of detainees by Navy SEAL Team 2 in Afghanistan was inexcusable act that has imperiled both relationship with Afghans and fight against Taliban; holds of equal concern is fact that SEAL command cleared those involved of all charges; urges military and civilian leaders to make clear that such actions will not be tolerated.
lead_paragraph: What happened at Kalach was a major disservice to the American efforts in Afghanistan.

headline.print_headline: What Went Wrong With Navy SEALs
headline.main: What Went Wrong With Navy SEALs

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
